title: Manage Drilling Contractor Performance
description: An exploration manager reviews the performance of a drilling contractor to ensure they are meeting their contractual obligations.

tasks.description: Retrieve the daily drilling reports from the contractor for the past month.
Analyze the data to calculate key performance indicators (KPIs) like meters drilled per shift and rig utilization.
Compare the KPIs against the contractual targets. Hold a meeting with the contractor to discuss performance and address any shortfalls.
tasks.expected_outcome: The performance review shows that utilization is below target, and a meeting is scheduled to discuss an improvement plan.
